ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Faces that Day will be radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How many faces will be refulgent on that Day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Some faces on that Day will be fresh and resplendent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the Day of Judgment some faces will be bright,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On that day, some faces will shine with freshness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Some faces that Day shall be Nadirah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Some) faces on that day shall be bright,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon that day faces shall be radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That day will faces be resplendent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Some faces will be radiant on that Day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Countenances on that Day shall be resplendent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Some faces will be fresh on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Some faces, that Day, will beam (in brightness and beauty);-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Some faces that Day shall be Nadirah (shining and radiant).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day there shall be radiant faces,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Faces on that Day will be radiant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:22] Some faces on that day, that is, on the Day of Resurrection, will be radiant, fair and resplendent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That day) the Day of Judgement (will faces) the faces of the believers who are true in their faith (be resplendent) beautiful, seemly and tender, 712
